function.name: extract_refrigerator_features
function.description: Extract key refrigerator/freezer specifications from Google search results.

capacity.description: Total capacity in liters based on the item requested in Google search. Convert from cubic feet if needed (cubic feet*19, rounded). Apply twin/single-unit rules. folad numbers or number > 1000 are not approved

type.description: Physical configuration type of the refrigerator/freezer.

technology.description: Cooling and motor technology. May be full combination or partial according to the above values and said rules.

smart.description: Whether the unit supports Wi-Fi/app/AI/smart features.
